name: Snake Game (jpiano)
description: Similar to the game Snake, but more complex. It includes 9 levels consisting of either apples that reduce the players score, AI snakes, obstacles, or a combination of all three.  Use WASD to eat as many red apples as you can, and avoid the green ones. Eating a total of 5 apples is a level up. The game is over when the player eats too many green apples, or hits a wall, obstacle or AI snake. You may just get lucky and win the game if the AI snake eats too many green apples!
